CrazyCopter.utils

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • CrazyCopter.utils.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Button
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    Custom buttons used in the Menu of the Game Based off the functionality of the Rectangle class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • drawButton

        public void drawButton(java.awt.Graphics g,
                       int offset,
                       java.awt.Color color,
                       java.awt.Color color_hover)
        Used to display button in the Game and adds logic for mouse hovering and clicking on button
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics class used by caller
        offset - Used to help align text inside button
        color - Color of Button outline and text
        color_hover - Color of Button outline and text when mouse hovers over it
